snippet: About a third of adults ages 46 through 64 were divorced, separated or had never been married in 2010, compared with 13 percent in 1970, according to a recent analysis.
abstract: About a third of adults ages 46 through 64 were divorced, separated or had never been married in 2010, compared with 13 percent in 1970, according to a recent analysis.

headline.main: Divorce Rates Among Boomers to Reshape Old Age
